title: For Sale - Single Family Home with Detached Studio – Grote Berg, Curaçao
description: Located in the desirable residential area of Grote Berg, this move-in-ready single-family residence offers a refined balance of comfort and investment potential. Set on 715 m² of owned land, the home features bright living and dining areas with air-conditioning, a contemporary kitchen with quality finishes, and seamless indoor-outdoor living. A covered back porch overlooks the private swimming pool, while a detached studio offers flexible use as guest accommodation or rental income. This turnkey property presents an excellent opportunity in one of Curaçao’s most sought-after neighborhoods.
features: Two modern bathrooms including an en-suite
Bright living and dining areas with air-conditioning
Detached studio suitable for rental or guests

title: For Rent - Modern Apartment Near Beaches – Jan Thiel, Curaçao
description: This well-maintained, fully furnished apartment is located in the highly desirable Jan Thiel area, within walking distance of Jan Thiel Beach, popular hotels, restaurants, shopping areas, and Van den Tweel Supermarket. The location offers an ideal balance of comfort, convenience, and lifestyle, making it one of Curaçao’s most sought-after neighborhoods. The apartment features a comfortable air-conditioned bedroom, a modern open-concept kitchen, and a private entrance, ensuring privacy and ease of living. The bathroom is equipped with a water heater, and the cozy back porch provides a pleasant outdoor space to relax. Additional amenities include a laundry room with space for a personal washing machine, WiFi included, and limited access to the swimming pool upon consultation.
features: Limited access to the pool (in consultation)
Laundry room (space for your own washing machine)

title: For Sale - Turn-Key Investment Opportunity – Juan Domingo near Mahuma, Curaçao
description: Located on a 484 m² freehold lot (eigendomsgrond), this well-maintained apartment complex built in 2020 offers three spacious 2-bedroom units — all currently rented, delivering immediate income to the new owner.
features: Quiet residential neighborhood, close to the main road, beaches, and just minutes from the airport
